sentence.Network_en: The assassin, gazing over the wizard's head, did not answer. GARETH smote Hugh rebukingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 刺客没有应声, 眼睛望向巫师头顶上方. 盖利斯狠狠的抽了他一下以示惩戒.

means.word_mean: 1. in the manner of someone delivering a rebuke

baesInfo.translate_result: rebuking责难或指责( rebuke的现在分词 )
